website_summaries.verdict: The Steelseries Arctis 7 wireless gaming headset combines solid audio quality, flexible connection options, and a comfortable fit at a reasonable price.
pros: Customizable with different headbands and earpads

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant set of cans
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant set of cans. Had sennheiser all my life, but plumped for these and have not been disappointed. Absolute top quality and fairly priced. Wouldn't say they are the absolute best for music listening, but for gaming, I cant fault them.
customer_reviews.author: Big H

customer_reviews.title: intelligent software, simple setup
customer_reviews.text: SteelSeries Arctis 7 [White]. been using expensive bowers and wilkins for years. got these for gaming, now using these for music playback. crispy clean sound. plenty of range and options to amend sound to suit. intelligent software, simple setup. comfortable top band and earphone, good button and mic placement. mic is good quality, clear and again flexible to suit all breathing types... music / game volume balance dial on right headphone is awesome. battery life and charging are solid. can now hear clear directional footsteps in game, just got to work on mouse skills. The White ones i purchased for £130 are £30 cheaper than everyone else selling black ones for £160.
customer_reviews.author: Mr L.

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. Been using for a few months now. Very stylish, excellent sound quality and comfy! They tick every box. The lights on the ear cups change colour... really cool! Ears dont get sweaty after prolonged use which is nice, cushion material feels really breathable. I love the extra sound control between games and chat... I can easily adjust it at the turn of the dial on my desktop when I am playing with friends. Nothing bad to say about these headphones. A million times better than Beats in my opinion !
customer_reviews.author: jk44

customer_reviews.title: Really good headphones, however volume dial after 4 months has ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones, however volume dial after 4 months has acquired some unbalance between left and right and requires wiggling to ensure it sets itself properly. , be weary that with PS4 you cannot use the 3d technology - but this goes for ALL headphones. The PS4 simplty does not support more than 2 channels. The sound quality and the mic are REALLY good though...maybe I just had bad luck with wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great headset, odd charging mechanics
customer_reviews.text: I really like this headset, it feels good, doesn’t sit sight in the head. Great sound quality. I use them for gaming primarily and I’ve paid twice as much before and they’re not as good as these. The only issue is the charging. I’ve still not worked it out and the manual is not correct. There are forums around this but I wouldn’t let this put you off. They charge fine but I think you have to have them ON to charge them which is odd. Certainly the best wireless headset out there for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: The Gadget Tester

customer_reviews.title: great headset! took me a while to make up my mind though XD
customer_reviews.text: i wasnt sure i even liked this headset at first, but after a month or two i got used to it and damn, it is way more comfy that my last headset Steel series Siberia elite prism, it is definitely worth it. great headset, can tell where all the sounds are coming from in csgo,pubg and Overwatch the sound really is good, 100% recommend. One other thing, mic is good quality, no background noise. especially with steelseries engine 3 software.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMitchLOL

customer_reviews.title: These headphones sound great, but are uncomfortable on the ears despite adjusting ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones sound great, but are uncomfortable on the ears despite adjusting the strap, the volume knobs for both audio and game/chat can easily be moved when picking up/putting down and when you put them back on and notice no sound you think because they normally turn themselves off they are off, only to find its just muted. They also have a stuttering problem when playing games which for the life of me, i can not find a solution to.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Allen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, very comfortable. Only minor issue with this is after about 4-6 hours the earpads can push slightly against your glasses. But very minor, simple adjustment solves this. Battery is very nice and the volume wheels on the back are very handy. Only minor concern is you might accidently rock these to max or to mute without realising. Finally, the mic. It is fine for online chats but not good enough for semi professional producers. I'd suggest an external mic for those that are uncertain about the mic. Overall, sensational headset, the app is easy to use and the volume mixer is actually a pleasant suprise. You can adjust everything to suit your tastes. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H

customer_reviews.title: Plugs and plays.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had problems replacing my old worn out 3.5mm headset since some of the new usb ones seem to have quirky issues depending on your PC setup...specifically the issues with windows 10. Thankfully these worked and work very well without any issues. The audio is clear, the mic is clear. You get 2 meters of cable to tangle yourself in and a handy dial to change voice/system sound levels on the fly. Another strong plus is the fabric, its soft and breathable i can think of many other headphones this comfortable. Not sure why they light up though since you cant see when wearing them it but hey, guess thats whats cool now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hall

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect but still better than most headsets.
customer_reviews.text: Good bass. Great for music. Charges quickly. Holds charge for a long while. Charging cable has broken after a year of use but it’s just a mini usb. Mic has good sound quality. Mute feature turns the tip of the mic red so you can visually see the mic has been muted. Volume controls aren’t in the best place, sometimes head movement changes the volume. Overall this headset it near perfect and I wouldn’t want to use anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I returned these because I couldn’t get on with the sound for games, didn’t sound right, even after going online and tweaking the settings, but then I don’t do well with change, so it’s probably me! The build quality is great, battery life was decent after many hours or use it hardly went down, the range is very impressive too!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They have sometimes some small problems with data transferring and are because of the material they are made of a bit warmer than I expected them to be but overall I think they are pretty good so I would recomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Miha

customer_reviews.title: Still the best, despite its shortcomings.
customer_reviews.text: Still the best option if you don't wanna triple the price and get their siberia user replaceable battery version. The Arctis 7 is still the best looking headset, IMO. Feels really good too. I have ordered their leather earmuffs. Awesome chat dial toggle, excellent noise cancellation and very good battery life so far. Mic recording quality could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: After some level fiddling, great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this headset. It's comfortable for long sessions, it has a sleek design, and after fiddling with levels in the SteelSeries Engine, it sounds great. However, the reason I give 4/5 is because I had to do a lot of messing with levels, whereas my previous headset (Turtle Beach PX21) sounded great straight away (though was much less comfortable!). One other issue is that while the headset is lightweight and comfy, as someone with small ears/head, it does slip about when I look down or turn my head. Had that issue before though, so not a huge problem.
customer_reviews.author: B.Free

customer_reviews.title: Ok step into wireless headsets
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my headset, but as some other reviewers have written the sound quality should be a lot better for the money paid. To be free from wires with a very stylish looking product, I am happy. Charging is easy, but can be a little confusing on your first use. When plugging in for your first charge, the microphone mute indicator will go red. This just means it is charging. If you wish to see the status of the charge, you need to turn the headset on, at which point the power led indicator will go from red to yellow to green.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, it is a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: The sound feels wrong on Arctis 5 without modifying settings in the Steelseries Engine. Worse than that though is that it relies on it being connected via the Chat Mix dial in order to make use of all its features (sound setting + illumination + microphones), so if there are any issues with it, you'll end up with just some generic headphones. Not only it is a bit unwieldy (as in very easy to accidentally turn it no matter what you do), it also breaks really easily (in my case, 2 months). At this price, better buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei

customer_reviews.title: Sounds ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: Opted for these to replace my broken Corsair void headset. For me, the sound sounded lacking and Lacked depth. I returned the pair On that basis. Build quality felt solid and sturdy and mic quality was decent although has a slight problem with hissing Opted to go sennheiser with a FiiO e10k in the end although over double the price. Overall, ok for a budget headset, for users who like their sound id recommend spending a little more but these would improve with something like the e10k.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: A+ for Comfort
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has struggled a great deal over the past couple of years to find a headset which is comfortable, due to my head being sensitive to pressure and the fact that I wear glasses, this headset is wonderful! I can wear it for hours with no discomfort. The sound isn't as good as my old Sony earphones (which were the best I've ever had), but because of their comfort level, this isn't an issue. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfy The mic is pretty good The sound is preferable to the high end basically the opposite to any of the razer headsets. So it's up to what you preffer. All round audio quality, not amazing at loud volumes. The volume wheel isn't great, (with mine) the volume in each driver is slightly but noticeably different whenever the wheel isn't at maximum and when it is at maximum there is a very audible electrical noise. The software is pretty good but the battery indicator doesn't seem to show the true battery percentage above half way. I would say that if you payed £100 for these it'd be a fairer price.
customer_reviews.author: Max A.

customer_reviews.title: Wire broke within a year.
customer_reviews.text: So the headset itself is light and the sound quality is good, the problem i have is the cable that connects to the PC has failed after 9 months, the site does replacements but after waiting for a long time for it to be in stock, it seems like it's no longer being produced, so now, all due to a faulty cable, a £90 headset is useless. Edit: For some reason this review is appearing on the arctis 7, when i purchased the arctis 5 and am writing the review through my order history of SteelSeries Arctis 5, RGB Illumination Gaming Headset, DTS 7.1 Surround for PC, PC / Mac / PlayStation 4
customer_reviews.author: I. Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Great unless you want some Bass
customer_reviews.text: If you want these for your PS4 and like to hear your shots land with a satisfying “thud” these are not for you. Whilst the sound is crisp and you can hear every detail such as direction of footsteps there is almost no bass at all. Such a shame for a product that is perfect in every other way. I really tried to get past the bass issue. I also set them up on a high spec PC with little or no improvement. In the end I returned to replace with Astro 50s which apart from being ugly, sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Melchy72

customer_reviews.title: Not for  the big heads, but otherwise superb
customer_reviews.text: The are really superb quality with an excellent sound. Unfortunately for me the head band pressed too tightly (I have a big head!!!) and I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounds and ultra comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sounds and ultra comfortable. First pair of headset (and I have had a few!) That are competent comfortable after extended hours of continuous use. Sounds adjustable wheel is excellent for in gaming and the other when for game/chat is also really useful when trying to hear each other in loud scenes. In short - Best headset I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: chris joyce

customer_reviews.title: Alright in stereo, TERRIBLE in surround
customer_reviews.text: Look lovely, solid build, very comfortable and decent sound when used in stero but the second you switch on the DTSX surround it just nosedives. Bass drops away, middle is muddy (despite EQ fiddling) and it just sounds like you listening to your games from the end of a long cardboard tube. Mic is solid but doesn't make up for shocking audio, may be worth a look if they ever rework it and implement Dolby Headphone rather than DTSX
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Best headset that I have used yet. Yet again Steelseries never fail to impress me. Extremely comfortable, surprisingly light weight, great sound and the microphone is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great confort, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to connect with my laptop using just the usb cable. It's very confortable and I don't have to touch it or adjust it after a session of several hours. The sound quality is great, I think the microphone quality is good in general, which is enough for me. The only problem is the feedback that is very low when you speak in the microphone, but as the headphone doesn't isolate much, you can still hear you so that's not so bad. Had it for a few years now and it's still working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Emergency

customer_reviews.title: Brought two pairs, both dead within 10 months of delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Spectacular sound and very comfortable. I was so impressed but... After 5 months the receiver died so got a replacement via Amazon. Just a random problem I thought. Next one arrived and equally overjoyed with the headset - best cans I have owned, delighted. Then after 10 months the headset just dies mid game, no warning just pffzzz. I couldn't send them back to Amazon, I assume because of the length of time I had had them so tried Steelseries. I learnt that the return process requires such stupidly complex information providing that I just gave up and brought a different brand headset. Such as shame as they were my pride and joy :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, poor ear pad choice.
customer_reviews.text: Solid gaming headset with decent sound quality and a nice structure to it. Can't really fault the headset itself. Such a shame that the ear pads that come with the headset are incredibly shallow - I had to go out and purchase the leather ones as an additional cost since they have a bit more thickness and meant that my ears weren't being squashed against the inside of the cup. Would recommend the headset and also the leather pads
customer_reviews.author: Scott Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but faulty cables.
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent headphones HOWEVER one of the cable adapters that came with them arrived broken so couldn't be used. Very shortly after the other one broke so the headphones could not be used at all. The company were very awkward about it when contacted and ultimately refused to pay the very expensive shipping costs for a replacement part even though these were brand new and very expensive. Had to order a replacement part through another company and no complaints since.
customer_reviews.author: K Lakie

customer_reviews.title: Look Great, Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box they give the impression of quality, with nice packaging and quality materials. On the head they are some of the most comfortable headphones I have ever used, the fabric band keeps them in place without adding pressure as some solid bands can. Sound is also great, using the software's surround sound settings gives a real impression of space in the sound when watching video, it is not really surround sound, but it is a nice effect that enhances the experience. Music listening is good too, as long as you stick to stereo, its clear and with good volume when you need it. Overall, solid headphones that sound as good as they look.
customer_reviews.author: NoggintheNog

customer_reviews.title: AVOID! Do not buy these
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in June 2018 all worked fine but now it wont charge as the USB socket is wobbly. Youd think for £99they would have a sturdier charging socket? Arctis completely avoided repairing it saying that it is Amazons fault but, despite saying they would (eventualy) replace it or refund me as I was within the 2 year warranty, they are now avoiding that as they say I didnt post it back on time (I wasn't well and couldnt go out...global pandemic anybody??). Sick of this treatment
customer_reviews.author: Iain Mac01

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for Discord
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, USB only meant no feedback for my CSGO buddies, and they say they have never heard me so clearly. Helping detecting enemy direction and hand volume control on left headset. They cover the ear well but my only grumble is that they are a bit tight, or it's my big head :<) Well worth downloading the associated software, can configure for different games. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mobius

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure i would find a good comfortable headset but i must say the Arctis 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my ageing siberia v2 headset. I wasn't sure i would find a good comfortable headset but i must say the Arctis 3 is the most comfortable headset i have ever worn! The cups sit completely over the ears so they can be worn for long gaming sessions no problem. The sound quality is great if you download the additional equalizer from the SteelSeries website. I've used the mic a couple of times which is clear and blocks out many background noises. I would recommend to anyone that wants a bargain headset with great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Strawdog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Well built
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well built, sturdy and comfortable. Able to wear for hours with no discomfort. The material keeps ears nice and cool. This would have been a 5 star if there was some way to disable the receivers LED which continually flashes when the cans are off. Nothing a bit of tape won't go, but for this price I would expect a software setting to do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Craig McNicholas

customer_reviews.title: Passable audio quality, noisy hum on line out
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of using the audio pass through on this headset. What promised to be a super useful feature has ruined the product for me, as the buzz from using the line out renders the feature unusable. After having tried multiple receivers, it seems as though it's just a feature of the headset. Audio quality is fine for games, not much good for music though. Disappointing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Harry NC

customer_reviews.title: Mic Buzzing After Just Over 1 Year
customer_reviews.text: I liked the headset, worked well for gaming, music and voice apps. A year in the mic started producting a buzzing that annoys whoever I am in a call with but of course the headset has only 1 year warranty. Expected better from my favourate PC peripheral manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome....
customer_reviews.text: These are sexy. Plenty of options with them too, wired/wireless. Excellent head set. Comfy to wear and dont get tight or horrible like some other headsets. There super noise cancelling too so if you wanna not hear the wife moaning (or husband) then buy them. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dazza

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones even after some poor reviews and haven't looked back. If you don't want the turtle beach style or tritons which I found extremely pressured around the ears. These are the ones for you, the sound quality is perfect, no pressure on ears and easy to set up. Although they're quite old now compared to the Arctic 7's these are my preferred choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Pearne

customer_reviews.title: Horribly uncomfortable and riddled with issues
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how everyone keeps saying this is the best wireless headset going, it's horribly uncomfortably, hurts my ears to no end. It randomly turns off for no apparent reason, the battery lasts about 20 minutes, I might as well have purchased a wired headset the amount of time I have this thing on charge. Sound quality is pretty good but it's definitely not worth the trade off, I wish I could return this and get something that's actually worth the money, I wouldn't pay more than £40 for these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bit of kit works well with the ps4 (after update) and is fantastic for gaming and music on my pc. Quick to setup very straight forward instructions must update it before use on ps4 and the chat/game slide on the right ear only effects the volume on ps4 unless there is a fix for that haven't checked. Well worth the £140 I paid for them both! Had to buy my wife one as well after I let her try mine and super comfy the head strap makes it so light on my head and haven't noticed any pressure points after long periods of play
customer_reviews.author: FrankyFoo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, neutral sound. 7.1 VSS not so great
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headset, it is incredibly light and the headband makes it feel like it's floating over your head. Despite this, the construction quality seems good. The chatmix dial is very useful. The sound is very neutral, so if you are used to a bass heavy headset like I was, it will take some getting used to. The only gripe I have is that I can't make the 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound sound good, but since I don't play FPS games and I got the headset for a very good price, it doesn't bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Dias

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as it seemed like the best wireless headset on the market for what ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as it seemed like the best wireless headset on the market for what I wanted it for, casual gaming. I found it really comfy, the build quality felt solid, the sound was good & the mic was adequate (not the best). The main fault is that the drivers for this headset caused my PC to BSOD randomly, so have had to refund it and look for an alternative headset.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Let down by the basic software.
customer_reviews.text: Product met my expectation, does everything as said on the box. Setup had no hassle and was very quick - basically plug and play. Its wireless has great strength. The signal didn't drop once since I've purchased it months ago. The battery is fantastic, lasts me the whole weekend from a full charge. But its software is good at best. It doesn't allow me to fully customise the levels. Even after months, it hasn't updated to a level where I would consider it acceptable for a £130. This hopefully will change soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad sound quality when surround sound is active
customer_reviews.text: Turning surround sound on with these headphones makes everything sound awful, all in-game voices sound like they've been recorded in someones shed with a cheap phone recorder, and everything else sounds like its played down a tin can. With surround sound turned off they sound quite good, but since surround sound is such a big feature of the headset you cannot just overlook its atrocious effects on the sound quality. Anybody looking for a headset may as well go elsewhere, you can definitely get better sounding headsets for much less money (I bought these for £90).
customer_reviews.author: Meme Man

customer_reviews.title: Durable.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the left/right aux adjuster not working after a very short while it's a great headset, it's been dropped, crushed, bent, burn't and pretty spent by this point and it's honestly the same quality, doesn't even scratch the material is kind of furry so it just smooths out the scratches from what I've experienced. Could be a little louder but volume is loud enough for music.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin

customer_reviews.title: ... I have owned a gaming headset that is so comfortable. Even after wearing them for a good few ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I have owned a gaming headset that is so comfortable. Even after wearing them for a good few hours they still don't hurt or get uncomfortable like a lot of headsets can do. Plus the sound quality is brilliant meaning you can just use them for listening to music and other things. Would highly recommend! Only downside is where the sound wheel is located, it can result in the sound wheel being moved accidentally through you turning your head.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed by the sound quality and the overcomplicated design with the Chat and Game mode. Sometimes I am struggling to find why I am not getting any sound whether it is the volume being too low or whether I am in the right mode. The sound quality is very bad compared to my other headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: great for small heads
customer_reviews.text: great! the only thing I would say is that on windows 10 the surround sound instillation does not work and will crash the pc. This is a perfect headset for small heads!
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Better than Logitech.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought SO many headsets, I have 4 unopened right now. This for the price is 100% worth buying. If it dies I will buy it again. The quality and endurance this thing has. The microphone and sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Nanocore

customer_reviews.title: Charging ports like to break
customer_reviews.text: Sound was great, very comfortable. Poor performance when it came to charging. Charging port did the classic break within a couple of days of owning the headset, sent them back and went for a more expensive pair that didn’t have the need for a charging port.
customer_reviews.author: harvey stamley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Headset
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset, you can hear little base at first but then when i downloaded the software i could adjust it to whatever i wanted, you can clearly hear where the enemies are and where sounds are coming from in games, in music you also feel immersed and it is good for use for both my xbox one, ps4, phone and my pc and i think it would work fine with any other devices, the rgb lighting is also very good and easy to control through the software.
customer_reviews.author: Dorota Ciura

customer_reviews.title: Shallow
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, a nice range, good surround. Pads were very good quality, sadly too shallow 5mm more and it'd be no problem, bought deeper ones, third party. Headband exceptionally comfortable, although a wider range of adjustment would be preferable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonsson A.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant wireless headset
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and very comfortable, I barely notice I'm wearing them even after many hours of playing or watching stuff. I find that I don't have to charge them up that often at all and I use them pretty much every evening. 4 of my friends have now bought the same headset from my recommendations and they all love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Wrayman

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these, great quality. They work from a great distance and are very comfortable. The only thing I would change is the power button as having to hold down to turn on is a bit of a pain. Would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Mic has bug, check tech forums
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great, the sound is brutal, super comfy, class! But... has firmware bug, mic is too low, people cannot hear you. There's a fix for Windows but not for Mac, please note this works best for Windows, not Mac. Also 7.1 is for Windows only.
customer_reviews.author: Apocalypse Ant

customer_reviews.title: Great headet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset and once you fiddle with the EQ presets sound stunning. They are not as loud as the Razer Man O War but plenty loud enough. The build quality is fantastic, they feel very solid are supremely comfortable and do not creak and groan when you move like the Razers did!
customer_reviews.author: N00ds

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but...
customer_reviews.text: Considering the reviews I've read through - tons - when I received this I was so disappointed. So soft through the PS4 controller and not much better on the pc. As good quality as the sound is, I expected more control over the volume. Pretty looking but not good enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: WoodRust

customer_reviews.title: Good headset, sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Good headset, sounds great, good mic, and alot of customisation options, the battery is really good as well (roughly a week on a single charge for my use) the only problem was that at first they were not very comfortable, but the more I wore them the better it became and now they are really comfortable. Good value for money, especially for wireless.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and build quality but uncomfortable and have some design flaws
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality. Very good sound quality, particularly for gaming. Easy to locate footsteps etc on games such as RS Siege or PUBG. Not the most comfortable, size adjustment is limited, particularly on the higher end. People with big heads such as myself will have some discomfort. The wheels for controlling the volume and game/chat balance are too loose and easily brushed and changed by accident due to something brushing on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sinead

customer_reviews.title: These are bloody amazing!! Only issue is having to connect it ...
customer_reviews.text: These are bloody amazing!! Only issue is having to connect it to the PS4 directly when you want the RGB lights, but they are BEAUTIFUL, and sound amazing. Incredibly comfortable and my ears do not hurt or get sweaty due to the breathable material in the ear cups. VERY happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Sanj

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset I've ever owned. I struggle to find headsets that are small enough to fit my head. This fits perfectly. They are very comfortable. I'm able to wear them for hours at a time with no issues. They sound great and the mic quality is amazing. I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Zaubernova

customer_reviews.title: Great headset overall
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st wireless headset and I'm really happy with it, by far the most comfortable headset I've used. I was a bit concerned about battery life at first as i listen to music pretty much all the time, but it lasts over a day on a single charge easily which is more than enough for me. Microphone quality is great too, it barely picks up any background noise especially my keyboard clicking sound which I had trouble with in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason these were awarded best gaming headset
customer_reviews.text: Amazing experience. Sound is crystal clear - bass is excellent and mids and highs are crisp and clean. Sound quality from the mic is also excellent. Very comfortable on the head/ears and no listening fatigue at all. Thoroughly enjoying these and highly recommend them. They are a massive upgrade from my Turtle Beach Ear Force XO ONE set.
customer_reviews.author: gerstagram10

customer_reviews.title: got myself an Arctic 7 because I like this so much
customer_reviews.text: Another expensive gadget for my son....its lightweight....got myself an Arctic 7 because I like this so much......and oh yes....it lights up. Most important if you're a teenage kid !
customer_reviews.author: wantice

customer_reviews.title: Was a used item
customer_reviews.text: I expected a new item still in its packaging. Though this was clearly stuffed into its box with the wired screwed up and the headphones needing to be cleaned.... Though I couldnt be bothered to pay for postage to send them back. Feel a bit mugged but they are good headphones so I've kept them despite the clear false advertising...
customer_reviews.author: Joel W.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable headset
customer_reviews.text: From a comfort point of view this headset is the best I've experienced. It sits lightly on my (bald) scalp and I forget it's there in all honesty. Sound quality is good, but I'm someone who likes loud music and I've definitely had louder equipment in the past. Worth the purchase if you're tired of heavy headsets leaving grooves in your skull, does it's job on sound.
customer_reviews.author: Harris1505

customer_reviews.title: The headset is great, sound quality is good and the microphone is ...
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great,sound quality is good and the microphone is clear. However, the chat/game wheel is just a nuisance. It's super easy to knock, and just makes cable management a pain.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyRo

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive!
customer_reviews.text: The product’s volume is too low even at highest setting. It’s hard for other players in my party to hear me.
customer_reviews.author: IgnoranceKills

customer_reviews.title: Good product with weak Charging port.
customer_reviews.text: Good audio quality and features but be careful with the micro usb port because mine broke within 4 months. Supplier, please talk to me about this, 4 months for a £100 device is stupid
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily because I wanted a really comfortable headset for my PS4 and these delivered. I hear my friends and the game perfectly. The reason I dropped a star is because often my friends complain I’m very quiet, despite the mic being really close to my face but it isn’t all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Shadow

customer_reviews.title: excellent audio quality in and out and intuitive controls when ...
customer_reviews.text: genuinely surprised at the battery life of these. excellent audio quality in and out and intuitive controls when on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality headset
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality headset. The sound quality is brilliant , however if you are looking for more quality and than aesthetics , go for hyper x cloud 2 , there surround system is 20d better than these, the bass is better on the clouds , main reason why I got these is because I have a rival 700 , apex m800 and a qck + and qckxxl
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are a high quality product, very comfy and easy buttons, but the sound to me was a let down as it's more of the high and mid sounds and not a lot of low end, I fiddled with the setting but couldn't get good enough bass to suit me, and about 55% of the sound was in the left ear, when playing music or games.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Cutting

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic headset. The sound quality is great and the headset is very comfortable to wear. I use it all the time on Xbox and or ps and is great and easy to use. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: thevogs

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried many headsets for gaming... this is an A+
customer_reviews.text: Very clear and perfect for gaming for hours while getting up and doing other things thanks to wireless. Best feature aside from wireless is the ability to control on the headset the chat and audio sound independently. 10/10 on comfort too!
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomically great
customer_reviews.text: Great features and superb comfort level. Excellent build quality. Sound is ok. Nothing spectacular.
customer_reviews.author: Eoin Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect headphones and seriously comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have had these headphones for a year now and I cannot fault them at all. I had another type and they were tight on my head. Being prone to headaches they were no good so I wanted a soft light pair. These are just that, it barely feels like you are wearing them at all. The sound quality is also perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound, Amazing comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, really nice to wear. BUT, Terrible sound quality. Super muffled and poor. A real shame.
customer_reviews.author: The GLow

customer_reviews.title: Really good, sounds great in game
customer_reviews.text: Really good, sounds great in game, music is 4/5 still really good but lacking that bit of base. Microphone is nice and clear but the best bit is the battery, Ive had it a month and havent charged it once, admittedly I dont game a hell of a lot but at least 1 hour a day
customer_reviews.author: Tom Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset For Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I wear thick framed glasses, so finding a headset that's comfortable is very difficult. However these are perfect and are comfortable after long use. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like these . They compliment my HTC Vive well. I do use another brand for competitive gaming as they are slightly bad a picking up some noises in game but perfectly good headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bojay

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: By far the comfiest headset I've ever owned! Was disappointed there was no LED light around the ear cup like the ones I've saw Castro_1021 (turns out they were made specially for him as they sponsor him) but they're great nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Loved them perfect for gaming if you aren't craving "audio file" headphones. Sad to see that mine are not doing so hot but I have used them excessively and drop them a lot so kinda makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: The best headset so far
customer_reviews.text: Tried logitech, corsair and others. The mice and keyboards don't seem to meet my specs, but the headset is just right. Great comfort, sound and battery life. Combine with a magnetic cable for maximum comfort.
customer_reviews.author: sweetler

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headset, clear audio, great for gaming and immersion, amazing for listening to music as well. The one thing I think they could improve is the mic, I find it to be a bit worse than my previous headset (hyper x cloud 2),though I did improve the steel series mic via taking the foam piece off the hyper x and placing it on the mic of the steel series headset. Dispite this, I highly recommend this head set.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Cattermole

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headset
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Best headset ive had by far. Very comfortable ans you can have on for long time without digging and crushing like other headsets ! Surround sound is brilliant and picks up every little detail ! Very much would reccommend to anyone wanting to buy a new headset.
customer_reviews.author: josh edwards

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product. I did a lot of research before purchasing and when it arrived it exceeded my expectations. Only criticism is the easily knocked volume dials.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Broken after no physical damage in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The sound headphones worked well in all regards until recently. Without any physical damage to the headset, the sound and mic no longer work on any device and instead emit a constant high frequency noise when plugged in. If they cannot be repaired, they are certainly not worth the money I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: mrs s.

customer_reviews.title: Good if they stay functioning
customer_reviews.text: The low frequencies in the sound started distorting heavily before 6 months have even passed. Good headset otherwise though. Battery lasts for a few days before needing an hour charge.
customer_reviews.author: Ridai

customer_reviews.title: Want to monitor your sound board wirelessly with ZERO lag. This is the headset for you.
customer_reviews.text: Would highly recommend this headset. I am a streamer and run an audio setup with an external mixer and with this headset it is possible to monitor the sound mixer wirelessly with ZERO lag. I tried various different wireless headsets in this price range and none comes close. The headset is very comfortable even after 5 or 6 hours of wearing with glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: My girlfriend and son were at my front door for ...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and son were at my front door for a solid 10 minutes in the scorching heat with no way of getting in the house as they had no key to get in. They were banging on the door very loudly for ages to get me to answer the door but I couldn't hear a thing thanks to my new Steel Series Arctis 7 headset. 10/10 would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: john h.

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones for price
customer_reviews.text: Very good wireless headphones. Works well on PS4. But the surround sound for games is PC only. Very easy to set up, just plug and play. Can change settings via the app on a computer be it a PC or Mac. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: broady

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with these headphones but after only 6 months they have become faulty. The headset stops working mid session and sometimes won’t work at all. Not sure if it’s a problem with the cables, headset or mute button? It’s a real shame it broke so quickly considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: FigstersMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for working from home
customer_reviews.text: One of the best headsets I own. Feels good to finally go wireless and be able to talk away from my desk without taking off my headset. Makes conference calls so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beech

customer_reviews.title: Well built but very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This headset is by the far the most uncomfortable I've ever worn. The earcups are made from nice breathable material but are too soft so your ears are pressed against the plastic speaker cover. The build quality is good and the sound was ok once you download the profile for the game your playing and turn off 7.1.
customer_reviews.author: Jon W.

customer_reviews.title: It fits like a dream
customer_reviews.text: It fits like a dream. Just one problem: The headset does have volume wheels on both sides. These wheels are getting easily turned, when i am wearing a hoodie or sometimes even when i put it on. The wheels cannot be disabled by software, so currently i use a fine strip of tape all over these wheels. Beside that, it is best headset i have had.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with the sound quality**. They sit very comfortably. They feel heavy in-hand but not on-head. With their size, I don't have them resting around my neck. I put them down (get a headphone stand). The retractable Mic is a nice touch. **Not having compared the sound quality to any other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thorsson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I can listen to podcasts while walking around the house with my daily errands with these wireless headphones. The signal is very strong and the sound quality is excellent. Would highly recommended if you never want to purchase another headset again. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: love this headset, the rgb setting has full customization options, the earcups are comfy and mic quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality, but it's too damn small. Even after removing the sizing strap it's tight. Meaure distance between the top of your ears, across the top of your head. If >32cm, this isn't the headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: blue

product_meta.title: SteelSeries Arctis 7 Wireless Over-Ear Headphones - White

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars233 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
